description:
"Now you're more of a top. Do you still top mostly or do you bottom too?"
"Actually that is a complete lie," Brice admitted.
"What do you mean?"
"I am more of a complete bottom. Yeah."
Brice just turned 19 and he knows what he wants!
"Once I turned 18..." he said. "It was like two weeks after I turned 18... I got fucked for the first time and since then it's been like..."
"You saw the light."
"Every guy I've dated since then has been a top!"
After we spent some time with him we could appreciate it. He fucked himself with a dildo and you could tell he loved it!
"What do you like in a guy?"
"I like them tall..." he said. "They have to have abs, they have to be really muscular, but not too muscular."
"Are you a size queen?"
"Yes, the bigger the better!"
title: Brice
